OOC:  My plan worked out better than I could have hoped....except for 
the missiles.

BIC:  SS is blasted on his back by the missiles so they can't build on 
the previous damage, but make a fair mark of they're own, but as soon 
as Epyon hits down SS speeds downward mouth opened.

OOC: The maximum speed is mach 1, but the gravity should make him go 
faster (as I was planning anyway) so there is no way Epyon can dodge 
this one.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon/Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod lunges to the right, and goes into a roll, the shots hitting 
the
> ground, where he had been. He gets up, and launches yet another two
> missiles at SS, who is now rather low, and doesn't have as much 
reaction
> time.
> 
> Epyon draws his saber, and sticks is streight down. He then drops.
> Between him dropping, and SS coming up at mach 1, there should be no
> reaction time, just impact...
